data.name: King of Peasants
data.detailed_description:
King of Peasants is a modern, story-driven adventure game, set in the dark ages during inquisition. It´s fast-paced, snappy and features streamlined interaction.



Based on Platonic Partnership´s CCO's Henri Tervapuro’s internationally published 'Knights' comics, King of Peasants is a satirical adventure game about prejudice and stupidity. The graphics are entirely handmade with a mix of watercolors and pencils. The visual style can be defined as a “living painting”.
data.about_the_game:
King of Peasants is a modern, story-driven adventure game, set in the dark ages during inquisition. It´s fast-paced, snappy and features streamlined interaction.



Based on Platonic Partnership´s CCO's Henri Tervapuro’s internationally published 'Knights' comics, King of Peasants is a satirical adventure game about prejudice and stupidity. The graphics are entirely handmade with a mix of watercolors and pencils. The visual style can be defined as a “living painting”.
data.short_description: King of Peasants is a modern, story-driven adventure game, set in the dark ages during inquisition. It´s fast-paced, snappy and features streamlined interaction. Welcome to medieval times!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
  • Additional Notes: Currently the game supports only 64-bit version of Windows
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Medieval times were tough so there is some harsh language present in this game. And some violence too.
